Author: TheMilkierMan
Text: This happened to me once too a few months ago. I was restricting for a few days before, woke up one day sweating bullets, could barely walk or think, and it felt hard to breathe. Nobody was home, and I was sure I was dying. Needless to say, I was scared shitless (keep in mind this never happened to me before). I don't know why my first instinct was to stumble downstairs and have some leftover pizza my family had the night before, but I did. When I ate it left as suddenly as it came. I wasn't drinking before it happened, though, and it's never happened again, so I have no idea what it was or why it happened. Sorry for being of no help in terms of an explanation, but I hope it's brought you some amount of comfort to know that it's not just you.
